DOC.detailed_description: This study examine feasibility 10-lesson web-based intervention , R4Power program , effectiveness preventing symptom depression anxiety . The R4Power Program teach cognitive problem-solving skill cover classroom base intervention , include Penn Resiliency Program , find reduce prevent symptom depression child adolescent . This study examine whether adolescent benefit learn skill computer ( rather classroom ) intervention . Adolescents grade 6 8 participate study assign one two condition : intervention group complete R4Power program first year ( R4Power1 ) , waitlist control group complete R4Power program follow year ( R4Power2 ) . Students complete 10-lesson program course twelve week . They learn practice cognitive skill ( recognize link thought feeling , identify think trap , challenge negative belief ) problem-solving skill ( assertiveness , relaxation distraction , overcome procrastination , decision making ) . Adolescents participate study follow one year , cop response symptom depression anxiety assess four point : beginning study ( baseline ) follow-up assessment approximately 4 , 12 16 month baseline .
